entries: Fantastic Adventures contains ten short adventures designed for fast, fun, one-session play...
The adventures focus on key elements you need to run a game without bogging down.
Whitesparrow is a settlement of 500 souls known for raising large, four-horned goats...
Cyclopean Palm: A titanic six-fingered hand rises in the village center, mysterious and ancient.
The mist hangs heavy over Whitesparrow as rumors swirl of the Night Blade's return.

entries.name: Notable NPCs
entries: Ralavaz the Night Blade - Repentant former bandit chieftain.
Gardren the Night Lord - Disfigured and vengeful brother.

entries.name: Secrets and Clues
entries: Dousing boots with urine repels tangleweed.
The Night Lord is actually Gardren Willowmane.
